entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:04 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
